summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and the Department of Community Development; making an appropriation from the Engineering Operating Fund reimbursable by the Neighborhood Improvement Fund to aid the improvement of an alley between 18th Avenue South and 19th Avenue South from South Bayview Street to South College Street (Alley in Block 82, Plat of Central Seattle, Local Improvement District No. \_\_\_\_\_), by paving, etc., and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1980 Budget of the Engineering Department therefor.
